mapper.select: select approve.ID id,approve.APPROVE_STATUS approveStatus from tbl_project_plan_approve_request approve where approve.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} order by approve.ID desc LIMIT 0,1

select plan.ID id,plan.PLAN_CODE code,plan.PLAN_NAME name,plan.RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID userId, plan.DELIVERABLES description, plan.PLAN_START_DATE start,plan.PLAN_START_MILESTONE startIsMilestone1, plan.PLAN_END_DATE 'end',plan.PLAN_END_MILESTONE endIsMilestone1,plan.PLAN_DURATION duration, plan.PLAN_LEVEL level,tui.ID userId,tui.USER_NAME userName from tbl_project_plan_approve_request_detail plan left join tbl_user_info tui on tui.ID = plan.RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID where plan.PROJECT_PLAN_APPROVE_REQUEST_ID = #{approveRequestId} and plan.STATUS = 1 and tui.STATUS = 1 order by plan.PLAN_ORDER asc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_project_plan_approve_request( PROJECT_ID, REQUEST_USER_ID, REQUEST_REASON, APPROVE_STATUS )values( #{projectId}, #{requestUserId}, #{requestReason}, #{approveStatus} )
